All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Alerter
Used to instance alerts with a custom message and title.
Appointment
Responsible for containing and allowing access to Appointment data.
AppointmentDB
AppointmentDB is responsible for all queries to the database regarding Appointment objects.
AppointmentForm
AppointmentForm is the controller for AppointmentForm.fxml.
AppointmentOverlapException
AppointmentOverlapException is intended to be thrown when Appointments are scheduled with overlapping times.
Contact
Responsible for containing and allowing access to Contact data.
ContactDB
ContactDB is responsible for all queries to the database regarding Contact objects.
Country
Responsible for containing and allowing access to Country data.
CountryDB
CountryDB is responsible for all queries to the database regarding Country objects.
Customer
Responsible for containing and allowing access to Customer data.
CustomerDB
CustomerDB is responsible for all queries to the database regarding Customer objects.
CustomerForm
CustomerForm is the controller for CustomerForm.fxml.
DBConnector
DBConnector used to establish a connection with the user's database.
FirstLevelDivisionDB
FirstLevelDivisionDB is responsible for all queries to the database regarding first level divisions.
LanguageManager
The LanguageManager facilitates translation by utilizing the Resource Bundle 'lang'.
Login
Controller for Login.fxml.
LoginMonitor
LoginMonitor is used to record all login attempts.
Main
Contains the entry point for the program.
ReportManager
The ReportManager is used to generate and write a report to a txt file.
Reports
Controller for Reports.fxml.
Schedule
Controller for the Schedule.fxml.
TimeManager
The TimeManager conducts all time-related responsibilities including compensating, comparing, combining, formatting, and calculating time differences.
TrackedDBObject
A class to be extended by classes that require tracking of creation date, who created the object, when the object was last updated, and who last updated the object.
User
Responsible for containing and allowing access to User data.
UserDB
UserDB is responsible for all queries to the database regarding User objects.
Validator
The Validator class is used to validate text fields against MySQL data types.
